ModMetaData.name: World Map Beautification Project - for Alpha Biomes
ModMetaData.author: Carolusclen
ModMetaData.description:
This is a DLC for the mod "World Map Beautification Project" by Odeum.
The DLC adds support for the "Alpha Biomes" mod
[h1] Features [/h1] - Feralisk Infested Jungle - An incredibly thick jungle, completely infested with spiders. [*] Lush green hills [*] Thick jungles - Gallatross Graveyard - These parched mudflats are littered with the ancient bones of colossal Gallatrosses. [*] Sandy windswept mountains [*] Bone Jungles - Gelatinous Superorganism - A huge mold-like organism has grown in this area, basically destroying the previous existing ecosystem, and replacing it with an alien landscape of its own creation. [*] Solidified Slime mountains [*] Strange sticky trees - Mechanoid Intrusion - A mechanoid hive was dismantling this biome, turning its mass into computronium, and hastily left it abandoned for unknown reasons. [*] Mountains made of machine [*] Strange looking trees - Mycotic Jungle - The Mycotic Jungle is a super dense overgrowth of massive giant mushrooms, covered in a coat of mycelium. [*] Fungus covered mountains [*] Forests of strange mushrooms - Ocular Forest - This sickly looking forest seems to be completely alien, probably of an extra-dimensional origin. [*] Mountains tinted a strange red [*] Trees watching your every move - Propane Lakes - Huge liquid propane lakes fill this desolate frozen landscape. [*] Snapfrozen Mountains topped in thick snow [*] Strange plants that almost look too fragile to touch - Pyroclastic Conflagration - A desolate expanse of obsidian and solidified lava, with several active calderas bubbling menacingly. [*] Hot spiked rock [*] Even hotter trees - Rocky Crags - This desertic landscape appears to be perpetually covered in an unnatural fog that seeps all light from the sun. [*] Dark spiked rocks, the dull glow of the plant life barely breaks through the fog [*] Plants that glow (currently not working) - Tar Pits - Sun-baked mud, interspersed with patches of fertile grassy terrain. [*] Lush green plant-life - Idyllic Meadows - Product of ancient terraforming, these open grasslands were designed to be an utopian paradise: giant flowers provide both construction materials and sustenance, while an abundance of wildlife creates ample ranching and hunting possibilities. [*] Beautiful flowers everywhere, small as dots and large as trees - Miasmic Mangrove - Mangrove swamps, also known as mangals, are coastal wetlands found in tropical and subtropical regions. [*] Lush green plant-life in a humid environment
